title: AMA Rising

replies.body:
How did you come up with your IGN?
How did you find Avicus? Why do you still choose to play?
Do you play any other game? What are some of your hobbies?
What are some of your aspirations in life?

I play Trumpet c;
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
1. I couldn't Think of another username (My older name was xZoulsYT) Then I thought about The movie Risen.
2. I found avicus from my Best friend In Real life (ElementalAssasin). I still chose to play on avicus ever since I was on the disbanded team Bigboys, After Bigboys I went on Xenarch to Team rocket to Mars and so on and so on
3. I do play alot, Flash games, Unturned, GTA V, GMOD, Roblox, League of legends, etc. some of my hobbies are Gaming, Soccer and Basketball
4. My aspirations was to Register for University and get a Pharmacist Degree. My 2nd aspiration Is to make the best moments of my life
